intro.text.1: Find out what Facebook knows about you!
intro.text.2: How to upload your Facebook data to your polyPod
info.1: Only a copy of your data will be created. Your Facebook account remains unchanged!
info.2: For this you need your log-in data
info.3: IMPORTANT: Now you have to wait for your data to be ready for download. You will be notified by e-mail. This process can take up to 24 hours.
info.4: It can take up to 24 hours until your data is ready!
info.5: The file you import contains your Facebook information up to the present time. To update your data in the future, simply request a new version.
